summary: BRANCHE 3 (99% → 99.9%) Frontend Testing Complete. All 8/8 features verified. Service Worker V2 registered (sw-v2.js), ImageCDN detects AVIF/WebP formats, SSR Config initialized with prerender meta tag, HTTP/3 detection working (using HTTP/2 as expected). Web Vitals excellent: FCP 292ms, LCP 1224ms, CLS 0. Skip-link accessibility present.
passed_tests: Service Worker V2 registered (sw-v2.js) - state: activated
HTTP/3 detection working - protocol detected: h2 (HTTP/2, as expected)
SSR Config initialized - prerender meta tag: status-code=200
BIONIC logo visible with optimized formats (AVIF/WebP/PNG fallback in <picture> element)
Skip-link accessibility present: 'Aller au contenu principal' href=#main-content
Resource hints in document head: dns-prefetch (3), preconnect (3), prefetch (1), preload (4), modulepreload (1)
OptimizedImage component uses <picture> with AVIF/WebP sources
critical_code_review_comments: sw-v2.js well implemented with 5 separate caches (static, images, api, fonts, pages)
imageCDN.js correctly detects AVIF/WebP support with data URI tests
http3Optimization.js correctly detects HTTP/2 protocol via Navigation Timing API
ssrConfig.js properly injects prerender-status-code meta tag
edgeCaching.js has comprehensive CDN cache header configurations
serviceWorkerRegistration.js properly registers sw-v2.js with update handlers
All BRANCHE 3 modules properly initialized in index.js
context_for_next_testing_agent: BRANCHE 3 (99% → 99.9%) fully verified. Key optimizations: 1) Service Worker V2 (sw-v2.js) with advanced caching strategies (cache-first, stale-while-revalidate, network-first), 2) ImageCDN with AVIF/WebP detection and adaptive quality based on connection, 3) Edge Caching config for multi-CDN support, 4) HTTP/3 QUIC detection (falls back to HTTP/2 correctly), 5) SSR/Pre-rendering config with route definitions. The logo is displayed using OptimizedImage component with <picture> element fallbacks.

http3_quic_detection.note: HTTP/3 not available on this server, HTTP/2 used as expected
